content: Can anybody help me to fix https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/59220? There isn't that this problem's localisation is obvious . Look like rustc produce correct llvm code and it corrupted on some more far stage.
There's been discussion in various parts of the C toolchain about removing x32 support, and I wonder if we might want to do the same.
I know only about attempts to remove in Linux kernel in 2018. Can you add links to those topics?
